casebody.data:
EMILE KING v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 23954)

Lavery, C. J., and Foti and McLachlan, Js.

Submitted on briefs June 7 officially released June 29, 2004 Per Curiam.

The habeas court did not abuse its discretion in denying the petition for certification to appeal *904from the court’s denial of the petition for a writ of habeas corpus.

The appeal is dismissed.
